recipes.title: Vegan Lentil Soup
recipes.description: This is a hearty and delicious vegan lentil soup that is perfect for a cold day.
instructions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onion, carrots, and celery and cook until softened.
Add lentils, vegetable broth, diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-30 minutes until lentils are tender.

recipes.title: Chicken Fajitas
recipes.description: These chicken fajitas are a quick and easy weeknight dinner that the whole family will love.
instructions: Slice chicken, onion, and bell pepper into thin strips.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add chicken, onion, and bell pepper and cook until chicken is cooked through and vegetables are tender.
Add cumin, chili powder, paprika, salt, and pepper and stir to combine.
Serve in tortillas with desired toppings.

recipes.title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
recipes.description: This vegan buddha bowl is packed with healthy ingredients and is perfect for a quick and easy lunch or dinner.
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Slice avocado, cucumber, and carrot into thin slices.
Rinse and drain chickpeas.
Whisk together tahini, maple syrup, apple cider vinegar, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Assemble bowl with quinoa, avocado, cucumber, carrot, and chickpeas.
Drizzle with dressing.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: This beef stroganoff is a classic comfort food that is perfect for a cold day.
instructions: Slice beef into thin strips.
Heat butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add onion, mushrooms, and garlic and cook until softened.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Add flour and stir to combine.
Add beef broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 10-15 minutes until sauce has thickened.
Stir in sour cream and season with salt and pepper.
Serve over egg noodles.

recipes.title: Vegan Chickpea Curry
recipes.description: This vegan chickpea curry is a hearty and flavorful dish that is perfect for a quick and easy dinner.
instructions: Slice beef into thin strips.
Heat butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add onion, mushrooms, and garlic and cook until softened.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Add flour and stir to combine.
Add beef broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 10-15 minutes until sauce has thickened.
Stir in sour cream and season with salt and pepper.
Serve over egg noodles.
